column1: Uchi////I went there during Happy Hour (5:00 - 6:30). I gave this restaurant 4 stars for the price of Happy Hour
column2: which is 50% off original prices. If I came here and had to pay $$$$ for the dishes I ordered
column3: even though the size would be bigger than the Happy Hour size
column5: as I don't think the food quality lives up to the normal price. But then
column7: restaurants in Houston are inferior to those in the other cities I have lived in
column8: including New York and Kansas City. So within Houston
column9: this is the 2nd best Asian restaurant I have been to (the best one is Kata Robata).
